title: Shameless Sex,Trends & Threesomes with April Lampert

description:
On today’s show Emily is joined by host of the Shameless Sex podcast, April Lampert along with her partner to talk about the sex trend of 2019 from sex toys to potential threesomes.

They discuss why being your authentic self is THE sexiest thing you can do, what it’s like working for a sex toy company and the perks that come with it -- no pun intended -- and how to have healthy communication with your partner and why it’s extremely important.

Thank you for supporting our sponsors who help keep the show FREE:

Good Vibes, Karezza, Fleshlight, Magic Wand, and SiriusXM. 

Follow Emily on all social: @sexwithemily

For even more sex advice, tips & tricks, visit: sexwithemily.com

 


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
